name: places/ChIJodkncLJZwokRlcperXasXzY
adrFormatAddress: 440 9th Ave, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: Did not return any deposit and it's been 1 month+ since move out. Also, they are trying to keep 50% of my deposit for moving out in the 2nd of the month instead of the 1st of the 30th/31st. Not that it matters because I've received 0 so far.

text.text: Did not return any deposit and it's been 1 month+ since move out. Also, they are trying to keep 50% of my deposit for moving out in the 2nd of the month instead of the 1st of the 30th/31st. Not that it matters because I've received 0 so far.

originalText.text: Didn't respond to emails for months when trying to move out. After finally getting in touch with someone to move out, they refused to give us back our security deposit despite being legally required to. Can't say I'd recommend

text.text: Didn't respond to emails for months when trying to move out. After finally getting in touch with someone to move out, they refused to give us back our security deposit despite being legally required to. Can't say I'd recommend

originalText.text:
Didn't disclose bed bugs, refused to return security deposit, rude & unprofessional in all interactions

I am not one to complain - this is the only review I've ever left. These guys are some of the worst people you will ever find

originalText.text: Do NOT hire this self proclaimed management company. The building I live in hired them months ago and no residents have received any sort of communication from them, not even a simple intro email, nothing. They are extremely rude even though building residents are literally their clients. Honestly so insane.

text.text: Do NOT hire this self proclaimed management company. The building I live in hired them months ago and no residents have received any sort of communication from them, not even a simple intro email, nothing. They are extremely rude even though building residents are literally their clients. Honestly so insane.

originalText.text:
Appalling bad.  They are your run-of-the-mill "we're happy to cash your checks, but don't bother us if you need anything" management company.  Disgusting.  They don't answer the phone, and they never respond to messages.  If you have a problem--faulty plumbing, electrical problem, refrigerator on the blink, painting every 3 years, etc--you're on your own.
It's shocking that they get away with this.  You know they exist only because the money keeps being withdrawn from your checking account, but that's the only indication you have that they are a bona fide entity.
